sentences.en: But Davis disapproved of Houlihanand also tried to stop Alex Higgins turning pro.
sentences.cn: 但戴维斯不同意Houlihan,并试图制止阿莱克斯希金斯称为顶级球手.

sentences.en: Eliza, however, insists that Higgins respect her and the story ends with her winning his respect.
sentences.cn: 但是, 伊莱扎坚持认为希金斯应该尊重她,在故事的结尾她也赢得了他的尊重.

sentences.en: He interpreted the role of Professor Higgins wonderfully.
sentences.cn: 他非常出色地扮演了希金斯这个角色。

sentences.en: He is also, like Higgins, one of the coolest and most tenacious of competitors.
sentences.cn: 如同希金斯一样，他也是最为优秀，最为顽强的选手之一。

sentences.en: Henry Higgins and Colonel Pickering are sitting deep in conversation.
sentences.cn: 亨利·希金斯和皮克林上校下坐着专心地谈话.

sentences.en: Hey, this may be a way of getting rid of Dean Higgins.
sentences.cn: 嘿，这可能是一个摆脱希金斯院长的一个方法。

sentences.en: Higgins and many have won the first two station competition's championship especially.
sentences.cn: 希金斯和多特获得了前两站比赛的冠军.

sentences.en: Higgins begins half singing half yawning an air from La Fanciulla del Golden West.
sentences.cn: 息金斯一边打着呵欠,一边唱着当时流行的小调.

sentences.en: Higgins splits out two poles once more afterward 50 + , thus by 6:4 fixed victories.
sentences.cn: 希金斯随后再次打出两杆50+, 从而以6比4锁定胜局.

sentences.en: Higgins tried to mould the cockney girl into a elegant lady.
sentences.cn: 希金斯想把那个柔弱的女孩造就成一位高雅的淑女.

sentences.en: Higgins will expand the score to 4 - 2 , won match point.
sentences.cn: 希金斯将比分扩大为4-2后, 拿到赛点.

sentences.en: Higgins, lifted the teacup , her hand shed and some of the tea splashed on the table.
sentences.cn: 他看到母亲的脸上满是恐惧和绝望, 不再是刚才店里见到的那镇静而有光彩的脸.

sentences.en: Mrs. Higgins : However did you learn good manners with my son around?
sentences.cn: 希金斯的母亲: 你到底是如何跟我儿子学得如此举止大方、言谈得体的?

sentences.en: My fiance Earl Higgins , and I had recently moved to Los Angeles from Colorado.
sentences.cn: 那时我和我未婚夫艾勒·希金斯刚从科罗拉多搬到洛杉机来.

sentences.en: Poor sod, he almost got lucky for once ( Jack Higgins )
sentences.cn: 可怜的家伙, 有一次他几乎成了很幸运的人 ( 杰克希金斯 )

sentences.en: Professor Henry Higgins: Now, try it again.
sentences.cn: 希金斯教授: 现在再试一遍.

sentences.en: She's mad keen on hockey / on Arthur Higgins.
sentences.cn: 她极喜爱曲棍球[阿瑟.希金斯].

sentences.en: The group breaks up, leaving Higgins isolated.
sentences.cn: 人群散开, 留下息金斯一人在那里.

trans.tran_cn: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 希金斯 Hick的昵称，[人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 希金斯盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于别名，含义是“海盗”(viking,searover)，[人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 希金斯盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于人名，含义是“火”(fire)，[地名] [美国] 希金斯
